page.title: 18FAMILY LIFE IN ROGERSTONE
page.content: The day starts with breakfast which consists of a cup of tea,cereal,toast and jam.Then I go upstairs and dress. I leave for school at 8.20AM. After school I go home,change and often go out to play Subbuteo.This is a football board game for two players. There are eleven men on each side,nets, a referee,two linesmen and,of course,a ball. Andrea,my sister,is a tennis fanatic.My Mum and Dad are also quite sporty.Dad runs and plays squash and Mum plays badminton some evenings. My Dad is a headmaster and my Mum is a teacher.At 8.05AM they set out and do not return until 4.30PM.At 4.29PM I put the kettle on knowing they'll be home soon!
